/>
X.v.1.A.3.b
.
Who May Request an Administrative Review
A request for CO’s administrative review of an RO decision may come from any internal or non-Department of Veterans Affairs (VA) source, such as
service organizations
recognized attorneys or agents, and
other accredited representatives.
Reference
:  For more information on handling non-VA requests for an administrative review, see
M21-1, Part X, Subpart v, 1.A.3.c
.
title: M21-1, Part X, Subpart v, Chapter 1, Section A  - Compensation Service and Pension and Fiduciary (P&F) Service Guidance
citation: Part X, Subpart v, Chapter 1, Section A
